Package ec.co.ant

Class GreedyComponentSelector

java.lang.Object
ec.co.ant.GreedyComponentSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentSelector, Setup, Serializable
public class GreedyComponentSelector extends Object implements ComponentSelector
A trivial rule that builds solutions greedily to have the highest heuristic value in the neighborhood.
Author:
Eric O. Scott
